sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM FROM BASS0100 WHERE TPLVL_DPOB_CD IS NULL ORDER BY DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT SYS_DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , SYS_DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM FROM SYSM0050 ORDER BY SYS_DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT USE_SYS_DIV_CD AS COMM_CD , USE_SYS_DIV_CD AS COMM_CD_NM FROM SYSM0050 ORDER BY USE_SYS_DIV_CD ASC
SELECT DPOB_CD AS COMM_CD , DPOB_NM AS COMM_CD_NM , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD FROM BASS0100 WHERE TPLVL_DPOB_CD IS NULL ORDER BY DPOB_NM ASC
SELECT SYS_DIV_CD , SYS_DIV_CD AS SYS_DIV_NM FROM BASS0100 WHERE SYS_DIV_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SYS_DIV_CD
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO BASS0100 USING DUAL ON (DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DPOB_NM=#dpobNm# , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM= replace(#degtrResnRegnNum#,'-','') , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM= replace(#busoprRgstnNum#,'-','') , CORP_RGSTN_NUM= replace(#corpRgstnNum#,'-','') , CORP_DIV_CD=#corpDivCd# , DPOB_ZPCD= replace(#dpobZpcd#,'-','') , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR=#dpobFndtnAddr# , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#dpobDtlPatrAddr# , DPOB_PHN_NUM=#dpobPhnNum# , DPOB_FAX_NUM=#dpobFaxNum# , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM=#dpobSealWrdNm# , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM=#dpobSealRftaNm# , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM=#dpobSealFlNm# , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN=#dpobFndtnUseYn# , HLTH_INSR_SYM=#hlthInsrSym# , NAT_PENN_SYM=#natPennSym# , UMYT_INSR_SYM=#umytInsrSym# , SYS_DIV_CD = #sysDivCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , TPLVL_DPOB_CD=#tplvlDpobCd# , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD=#retryCllnDebrDivCd# , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM=#hlthInsrOfceSym# , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM=#insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNum# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM=#idtlAccdtInsurSym# , MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#mtstBusinDivCd# , SYS_DPOB_CD=#sysDpobCd# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , TPLVL_DPOB_CD , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM , MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD , SYS_DPOB_CD) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dpobNm# , replace(#degtrResnRegnNum#,'-','') , #tplvlDpobCd# , #degtrNm# , replace(#busoprRgstnNum#,'-','') , replace(#corpRgstnNum#,'-','') , #corpDivCd# , replace(#dpobZpcd#,'-','') , #dpobFndtnAddr# , #dpobDtlPatrAddr# , #dpobPhnNum# , #dpobFaxNum# , #dpobSealWrdNm# , #dpobSealRftaNm# , #dpobSealFlNm# , #dpobFndtnUseYn# , #hlthInsrSym# , #natPennSym# , #umytInsrSym# , #sysDivCd# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #revnAddr# , #retryCllnDebrDivCd# , #insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNum# , #insurPrvaffAgcyIstutNm# , #hlthInsrOfceSym# , #idtlAccdtInsurSym# , #mtstBusinDivCd# , #sysDpobCd#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS0100 ( DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , SYS_DPOB_CD ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dpobNm# , #degtrResnRegnNum# , #degtrNm# , #busoprRgstnNum# , #corpRgstnNum# , #corpDivCd# , #dpobZpcd# , #dpobFndtnAddr# , #dpobDtlPatrAddr# , #dpobPhnNum# , #dpobFaxNum# , #dpobSealWrdNm# , #dpobSealRftaNm# , #dpobSealFlNm# , #dpobFndtnUseYn# , #hlthInsrSym# , #natPennSym# , #umytInsrSym# , #sysDivCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #sysDpobCd# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS0100 SET DPOB_NM=#dpobNm# , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM=#degtrResnRegnNum# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM=#busoprRgstnNum# , CORP_RGSTN_NUM=#corpRgstnNum# , CORP_DIV_CD=#corpDivCd# , DPOB_ZPCD=#dpobZpcd# , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR=#dpobFndtnAddr# , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#dpobDtlPatrAddr# , DPOB_PHN_NUM=#dpobPhnNum# , DPOB_FAX_NUM=#dpobFaxNum# , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM=#dpobSealWrdNm# , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM=#dpobSealRftaNm# , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM=#dpobSealFlNm# , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN=#dpobFndtnUseYn# , HLTH_INSR_SYM=#hlthInsrSym# , NAT_PENN_SYM=#natPennSym# , UMYT_INSR_SYM=#umytInsrSym# , SYS_DIV_CD = #sysDivCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , SYS_DPOB_CD=#sysDpobCd# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM , SYS_DPOB_CD FROM BASS0100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DPOB_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE(DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM,'(^.{6})','\1-') as DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , DECODE(LENGTH(BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM),10, SUBSTR(BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM,1,3)||'-'|| SUBSTR(BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM,4,2)||'-'|| SUBSTR(BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM,6,5) , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM) as BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , REGEXP_REPLACE(CORP_RGSTN_NUM,'(^.{6})','\1-') as CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , DPOB_ZPCD , DPOB_FNDTN_ADDR , DPOB_DTL_PATR_ADDR , DPOB_PHN_NUM , DPOB_FAX_NUM , DPOB_SEAL_WRD_NM , DPOB_SEAL_RFTA_NM , DPOB_SEAL_FL_NM , DPOB_FNDTN_USE_YN , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , SYS_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , TPLVL_DPOB_CD , RETRY_CLLN_DEBR_DIV_CD , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NUM , INSUR_PRVAFF_AGCY_ISTUT_NM , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM , MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD , MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD AS mtstBusinDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD) AS mtstBusinDivCdcommCdNm , SYS_DPOB_CD FROM BASS0100 WHERE 1=1
AND DPOB_NM like '%'|| #dpobNm# || '%'
AND DEGTR_NM like '%'|| #degtrNm# || '%'
AND MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD = #mtstBusinDivCd#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0100 WHERE 1=1
AND DPOB_NM like '%'|| #dpobNm# || '%'
AND DEGTR_NM like '%'|| #degtrNm# || '%'
AND MTST_BUSIN_DIV_CD = #mtstBusinDivCd#
